sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
[eventLog.eventType] 
,[eventLog.source.applicationId] 
,[eventLog.source.userId] 
,[id] 
,[eventLog.timestamp] 
,[sourceFilename] 
,[processedTimestamp] 
,[hour] 
,[quarterhour] 
,[DWSourceFilePath] AS [SRC_DWSourceFilePath]
,[DWIsCurrent] AS [SRC_DWIsCurrent]
,[DWValidFromDate] AS [SRC_DWValidFromDate]
,[DWValidToDate] AS [SRC_DWValidToDate]
,[DWCreatedDate] AS [SRC_DWCreatedDate]
,[DWModifiedDate] AS [SRC_DWModifiedDate]
,[DWIsDeletedInSource] AS [SRC_DWIsDeletedInSource]
,[DWDeletedInSourceDate] AS [SRC_DWDeletedInSourceDate]
,[eventLog.source.error.userId] 
 
FROM exportNuuDW.[ChipperTicketsEventLog]
 WHERE DWModifiedDate > convert(datetime, stuff(stuff(stuff('@{activity('Lookup_Last_Value_Loaded').output.firstRow.LastValueLoaded}', 9, 0, ' '), 12, 0, ':'), 15, 0, ':'))

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
[id] 
,[tags] 
,[sourceFilename] 
,[processedTimestamp] 
,[hour] 
,[quarterhour] 
,[DWSourceFilePath] AS [SRC_DWSourceFilePath]
,[DWIsCurrent] AS [SRC_DWIsCurrent]
,[DWValidFromDate] AS [SRC_DWValidFromDate]
,[DWValidToDate] AS [SRC_DWValidToDate]
,[DWCreatedDate] AS [SRC_DWCreatedDate]
,[DWModifiedDate] AS [SRC_DWModifiedDate]
,[DWIsDeletedInSource] AS [SRC_DWIsDeletedInSource]
,[DWDeletedInSourceDate] AS [SRC_DWDeletedInSourceDate]
 
FROM exportNuuDW.[ChipperTicketsTags]
 WHERE DWModifiedDate > convert(datetime, stuff(stuff(stuff('@{activity('Lookup_Last_Value_Loaded').output.firstRow.LastValueLoaded}', 9, 0, ' '), 12, 0, ':'), 15, 0, ':'))

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
[appointment.id] 
,[assignee] 
,[created] 
,[customer.contact.channels.email.address] 
,[customer.contact.channels.email.preferred] 
,[customer.contact.channels.phone.number] 
,[customer.contact.channels.phone.preferred] 
,[customer.contact.name] 
,[customer.id] 
,[id] 
,[impact] 
,[issue.description] 
,[issue.start] 
,[issue.type] 
,[item.lid] 
,[reported] 
,[resolved] 
,[sla.id] 
,[status] 
,[subject] 
,[updated] 
,[sourceFilename] 
,[processedTimestamp] 
,[hour] 
,[quarterhour] 
,[DWSourceFilePath] AS [SRC_DWSourceFilePath]
,[DWIsCurrent] AS [SRC_DWIsCurrent]
,[DWValidFromDate] AS [SRC_DWValidFromDate]
,[DWValidToDate] AS [SRC_DWValidToDate]
,[DWCreatedDate] AS [SRC_DWCreatedDate]
,[DWModifiedDate] AS [SRC_DWModifiedDate]
,[DWIsDeletedInSource] AS [SRC_DWIsDeletedInSource]
,[DWDeletedInSourceDate] AS [SRC_DWDeletedInSourceDate]
,[product.id] 
,[outageid] 
 
FROM exportNuuDW.[ChipperTicketsTickets]
 WHERE DWModifiedDate > convert(datetime, stuff(stuff(stuff('@{activity('Lookup_Last_Value_Loaded').output.firstRow.LastValueLoaded}', 9, 0, ' '), 12, 0, ':'), 15, 0, ':'))

SELECT DISTINCT 
'AzureSqlDatabase' AS SourceSystemTypeName	
,COLUMNS.[TABLE_CATALOG] AS TableCatalogName
,COLUMNS.[TABLE_SCHEMA] AS SchemaName
,COLUMNS.[TABLE_NAME] AS TableName
,COLUMNS.[COLUMN_NAME] AS ColumnName
,COLUMNS.[ORDINAL_POSITION] AS OrdinalPositionNumber
,COLUMNS.[DATA_TYPE] AS DataTypeName
,COLUMNS.[CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH] AS MaximumLenghtNumber 
,CAST(COLUMNS.[NUMERIC_PRECISION] AS INT) AS NumericPrecisionNumber 
,COLUMNS.[NUMERIC_SCALE] AS NumericScaleNumber 
,KEY_COLUMN_USAGE.ORDINAL_POSITION AS KeySequenceNumber 
,@{item().SourceObjectID} AS SourceObjectID
FROM 
	INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
LEFT JOIN
	INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS
		ON
			TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.TABLE_CATALOG = COLUMNS.TABLE_CATALOG
		AND	TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.TABLE_SCHEMA = COLUMNS.TABLE_SCHEMA
		AND TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.TABLE_NAME = COLUMNS.TABLE_NAME
		AND TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'PRIMARY KEY'
LEFT JOIN 
	INFORMATION_SCHEMA.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE
ON	
	KEY_COLUMN_USAGE.CONSTRAINT_NAME = TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.CONSTRAINT_NAME
	AND KEY_COLUMN_USAGE.COLUMN_NAME = COLUMNS.COLUMN_NAME
WHERE 
	COLUMNS.TABLE_SCHEMA = '@{item().SourceSchemaName}'
	AND COLUMNS.TABLE_NAME = '@{item().SourceObjectName}'

SELECT DISTINCT 
'AzureSqlDatabase' AS SourceSystemTypeName	
,COLUMNS.[TABLE_CATALOG] AS TableCatalogName
,COLUMNS.[TABLE_SCHEMA] AS SchemaName
,COLUMNS.[TABLE_NAME] AS TableName
,COLUMNS.[COLUMN_NAME] AS ColumnName
,COLUMNS.[ORDINAL_POSITION] AS OrdinalPositionNumber
,COLUMNS.[DATA_TYPE] AS DataTypeName
,COLUMNS.[CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH] AS MaximumLenghtNumber 
,CAST(COLUMNS.[NUMERIC_PRECISION] AS INT) AS NumericPrecisionNumber 
,COLUMNS.[NUMERIC_SCALE] AS NumericScaleNumber 
,KEY_COLUMN_USAGE.ORDINAL_POSITION AS KeySequenceNumber 
,@{item().SourceObjectID} AS SourceObjectID
FROM 
	INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
LEFT JOIN
	INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS
		ON
			TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.TABLE_CATALOG = COLUMNS.TABLE_CATALOG
		AND	TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.TABLE_SCHEMA = COLUMNS.TABLE_SCHEMA
		AND TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.TABLE_NAME = COLUMNS.TABLE_NAME
		AND TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'PRIMARY KEY'
LEFT JOIN 
	INFORMATION_SCHEMA.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE
ON	
	KEY_COLUMN_USAGE.CONSTRAINT_NAME = TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.CONSTRAINT_NAME
	AND KEY_COLUMN_USAGE.COLUMN_NAME = COLUMNS.COLUMN_NAME
WHERE 
	COLUMNS.TABLE_SCHEMA = '@{item().SourceSchemaName}'
	AND COLUMNS.TABLE_NAME = '@{item().SourceObjectName}'

SELECT
[SourceSystemTypeName]
,[TableCatalogName]
,SchemaName
,URI AS [TableName]
,[ColumnName]
,[OrdinalPositionNumber]
,[DataTypeName]
,[MaximumLenghtNumber]
,[NumericPrecisionNumber]
,[NumericScaleNumber]
,[KeySequenceNumber]
,'@{item().SourceObjectID}' AS SourceObjectID
FROM [nuudataload].[v_Schema]
WHERE NUUDLJobCode = '@{item().NUUDLJobCode}'

SELECT
[SourceSystemTypeName]
,[TableCatalogName]
,SchemaName
,URI AS [TableName]
,[ColumnName]
,[OrdinalPositionNumber]
,[DataTypeName]
,[MaximumLenghtNumber]
,[NumericPrecisionNumber]
,[NumericScaleNumber]
,[KeySequenceNumber]
,'@{item().SourceObjectID}' AS SourceObjectID
FROM [nuudataload].[v_Schema]
WHERE NUUDLJobCode = '@{item().NUUDLJobCode}'

SELECT DISTINCT 
'AzureSqlDatabase' AS SourceSystemTypeName	
,COLUMNS.[TABLE_CATALOG] AS TableCatalogName
,COLUMNS.[TABLE_SCHEMA] AS SchemaName
,COLUMNS.[TABLE_NAME] AS TableName
,COLUMNS.[COLUMN_NAME] AS ColumnName
,COLUMNS.[ORDINAL_POSITION] AS OrdinalPositionNumber
,COLUMNS.[DATA_TYPE] AS DataTypeName
,COLUMNS.[CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH] AS MaximumLenghtNumber 
,CAST(COLUMNS.[NUMERIC_PRECISION] AS INT) AS NumericPrecisionNumber 
,COLUMNS.[NUMERIC_SCALE] AS NumericScaleNumber 
,KEY_COLUMN_USAGE.ORDINAL_POSITION AS KeySequenceNumber 
,@{item().SourceObjectID} AS SourceObjectID
FROM 
	INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
LEFT JOIN
	INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS
		ON
			TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.TABLE_CATALOG = COLUMNS.TABLE_CATALOG
		AND	TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.TABLE_SCHEMA = COLUMNS.TABLE_SCHEMA
		AND TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.TABLE_NAME = COLUMNS.TABLE_NAME
		AND TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'PRIMARY KEY'
LEFT JOIN 
	INFORMATION_SCHEMA.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE
ON	
	KEY_COLUMN_USAGE.CONSTRAINT_NAME = TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.CONSTRAINT_NAME
	AND KEY_COLUMN_USAGE.COLUMN_NAME = COLUMNS.COLUMN_NAME
WHERE 
	COLUMNS.TABLE_SCHEMA = '@{item().SourceSchemaName}'
	AND COLUMNS.TABLE_NAME = '@{item().SourceObjectName}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	SourceObjectID
        ,ConnectionType
	,FileExtension
	,FileSystem AS FileSystemName
	,FileName
	,concat(FileName,'.',FileExtension) AS FullFileName
	,Folder
	,TargetDestinationFlag
	,FileSpecification
	,RowSeparator
	,ColumnDelimiter
	,TextQualifier
	,IsHeaderPresent
	,Encoding
	,LoopFile
  FROM [meta].[SourceObjectDefinitions]
  WHERE ConnectionName = 'datalake01ingestionNetcracker_interim'
